feed.subtitle: I am Lahiru Pathirage, a polyglot software developer with a BSc in Computer Science, and a passionate advocate for cloud computing. Since 2015, I have worked on developing and delivering enterprise software solutions. My primary interest is designing and building software systems that combine sound software architecture with cloud computing technologies.
